info: This clothing has an owlbear fur lining sewn into it to <good>greatly increase</good> its overall <info>warmth</info>.
This clothing has a demon chitin padding sewn into it to <good>greatly increase</good> its overall <info>fire resistance</info>.
This clothing has a coating of black dragon scales applied to it in order to <good>greatly increase</good> its overall <info>acid resistance</info>.
